caption.title: Comparison of the subgenotype of HBV to the mPTP delimited clusters
caption.p: Comparison of the ssubgenotype of HBV, indicated by the first colored column, to the mPTP delimited clusters, indicated by the second colored column. The numbers indicate the support for a particular node being a speciation node (support <0.5 not shown, see also Fig. 1 in main text and Fig. S2) obtained by the MCMC sampling under the mPTP model.
Click here for additional data file.
